Assail.card_desc: [In Pursuit] Generate {scale=2|2} Ammo after activating In Pursuit.

Commencement.card_desc: [Combat Slide] Increase the travel distance of Combat Slide by {scale=10|10}%.

Compel.card_desc: [In Pursuit] Reduce the Cooldown of In Pursuit by {scale=1|1}s.

Death Hastens.card_desc: [Weapon] Your weapon shots deal 680 damage every 0.7s, but your Ammo count is reduced.

Discovery.card_desc: [Retribution] Increase the damage you deal to your Retribution target by 30% and reduce the Cooldown of Retribution by 15s.

Fortitude.card_desc: [In Pursuit] Heal for {scale=25|25} for each shot hit while using In Pursuit.

Hardiness.card_desc: [In Pursuit] Decrease your damage taken by {scale=5|5}% while using In Pursuit.

Heroism.card_desc: [Combat Slide] Gain Immunity to Crowd Control and reduce your damage taken by 90% while using Combat Slide.

Inescapable.card_desc: [Retribution] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=5|5}% while you are within 60 units of your Retribution target.

Justice Served.card_desc: [Retribution] Heal for {scale=15|15}% of your maximum Health after getting a Killing Blow on your Retribution target.

Keen Sight.card_desc: [Retribution] Increase the range at which your Retribution target is Revealed by {scale=10|10} units.

Requip.card_desc: [Combat Slide] Generate {scale=1|1} Ammo after activating Combat Slide.

Restock.card_desc: [Weapon] Generate {scale=1|1} Ammo after getting a Killing Blow or Elimination.

The Hunted.card_desc: [Retribution] You gain {scale=10|10}% Lifesteal against your Retribution target.

Warrants Out.card_desc: [Combat Slide] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 2s after Combat Slide ends.

Wicked Don't Rest.card_desc: [Combat Slide] Reduce the Cooldown of Combat Slide by {scale=5|5}% for each enemy hit by your weapons or abilties.

Angriffslustig.card_desc: [Hetzjagd] Nach Aktivierung von Hetzjagd wird {scale=2|2} Munition erzeugt.

Dienstantritt.card_desc: [Gefechtrutschen] Erhöht die Reichweite von Gefechtrutschen um {scale=10|10}%.

Entdeckung.card_desc: [Vergeltung] Du fügst deinem Vergeltungs-Ziel 30% mehr Schaden zu und die Abklingzeit von Vergeltung wird um 15s reduziert.

Flinke Stiefel.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Heldentum.card_desc: [Gefechtrutschen] Während Gefechtrutschen wird erlittener Schaden um 90% reduziert und du erhältst CC-Immunität.

Kopfnuss.card_desc: [Gefechtrutschen] Für jeden mit deinen Waffen oder Fertigkeiten getroffenen Gegner wird die Abklingzeit von Gefechtrutschen um {scale=5|5}% reduziert.

Nachschub.card_desc: [Gefechtrutschen] Nach Aktivierung von Gefechtrutschen wird {scale=1|1} Munition erzeugt.

N\u00f6tigung.card_desc: [Hetzjagd] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Hetzjagd um {scale=1|1}s.

Rechtspflege.card_desc: [Vergeltung] Tötest du dein Vergeltungs-Ziel, wirst du um {scale=15|15}% deiner maximalen Gesundheit geheilt.

Schneller Tod.card_desc: [Waffe] Deine Waffenschüsse verursachen alle 0,7s 680 Schaden, aber deine Magazinkapazität wird reduziert.

Tapferkeit.card_desc: [Hetzjagd] Für jeden Treffer während Hetzjagd wirst du {scale=25|25} LP geheilt.

Tempobefugnis.card_desc: [Gefechtrutschen] Erhöht dein Lauftempo nach dem Ende von Gefechtrutschen 2s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Unentrinnbar.card_desc: [Vergeltung] Erhöht dein Lauftempo im Umkreis von 60 Einheiten um dein Vergeltungs-Ziel um {scale=5|5}%.

Weitsicht.card_desc: [Vergeltung] Erhöht die Entfernung, in der dein Vergeltungs-Ziel sichtbar wird, um {scale=10|10} Einheiten.

Z\u00e4higkeit.card_desc: [Hetzjagd] Während Hetzjagd wird erlittener Schaden um {scale=5|5}% reduziert.

Bien huil\u00e9.card_desc: [Arme] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=5|5}%.

Conditionnelle.card_desc: [Armure] Votre vitesse hors combat augmente de {scale=3|3}%.

D\u00e9position.card_desc: [Glissade] La distance de Glissade augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Force d'\u00e2me.card_desc: [Poursuite] Chaque tir réussi de Poursuite vous rend {scale=25|25} PV.

Fugitif.card_desc: [Châtiment] Vous avez {scale=10|10} de drain de vie contre la cible de Châtiment.

H\u00e9ro\u00efsme.card_desc: [Glissade] Vous subissez 90% de dégâts en moins et vous êtes immunisé aux contrôles pendant Glissade.

In\u00e9luctable.card_desc: [Châtiment] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=5|5}% à 60 unités de la cible de Châtiment.

Le Mal ne dort jamais.card_desc: [Glissade] Le temps de recharge de Glissade diminue de {scale=5|5}% par ennemi touché avec vos armes ou vos compétences.

Mandat d'arr\u00eat.card_desc: [Glissade] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=10|10}% pendant 2s après Glissade.

Mesures d'instruction.card_desc: [Châtiment] Châtiment se recharge 15s plus vite et vous infligez 30% de dégâts supplémentaires à la cible.

Mort pr\u00e9cipit\u00e9e.card_desc: [Arme] Les Magnums infligent 680 dégâts toutes les 0,7s mais ils ont moins de munitions.

Regard per\u00e7ant.card_desc: [Châtiment] La cible de Châtiment est révélée {scale=10|10} unités plus loin.

Robustesse.card_desc: [Poursuite] Vous subissez {scale=5|5}% de dégâts en moins pendant Poursuite.

Sentence.card_desc: [Châtiment] Exécuter la cible de Châtiment vous redonne {scale=15|15}% de vos PV max.

\u4f38\u5f20\u6b63\u4e49.card_desc: [审判] 击杀审判目标时回复{scale=15|15}%生命值

\u516c\u6b63\u5609\u5956.card_desc: [武器] 击败敌人或助攻时回复{scale=1|1}发弹药

\u521a\u6bc5.card_desc: [追捕到底] 技能每次命中敌人都将回复{scale=25|25}点生命值

\u5ba1\u8baf.card_desc: [追捕到底] 激活追捕到底时，回复{scale=2|2}发弹药

\u5f3a\u786c\u6001\u5ea6.card_desc: [追捕到底] 追捕到底期间,受到的所有伤害降低{scale=5|5}%

\u6b7b\u4ea1\u901f\u81f3.card_desc: [武器] 你的武器对生命值高于65%的敌人造成25%额外伤害。

\u6cd5\u5ead\u4f20\u5524.card_desc: [战斗滑铲] 战斗滑铲的距离提高{scale=10|10}%

\u6cd5\u773c.card_desc: [审判] 审判的追踪范围提高{scale=10|10}码

\u6cd5\u7f51\u6062\u6062.card_desc: [审判] 当你与审判目标的距离小于60码时，移动速度提升{scale=5|5}%

\u7f6a\u6076\u63ed\u53d1.card_desc: [审判] 对审判的目标造成30%额外伤害，审判的冷却时间也会降低15秒

\u82f1\u52c7\u6267\u6cd5.card_desc: [战斗滑铲] 战斗滑铲期间获得控制免疫效果，受到的伤害也会降低90%

\u901a\u7f09\u4ee4.card_desc: [审判] 攻击审判目标时获得{scale=10|10}%生命偷取

\u903c\u8feb.card_desc: [追捕到底] 追捕到底的冷却时间降低{scale=1|1}秒

\u90aa\u4e0d\u80dc\u6b63.card_desc: [战斗滑铲] 普通攻击命中敌人时，战斗滑铲的冷却时间降低{scale=5|5}%

\u91cd\u88c5\u4e0a\u9635.card_desc: [战斗滑铲] 使用战斗滑铲后获得{scale=1|1}发弹药

\u94c1\u8bc1\u5982\u5c71.card_desc: [战斗滑铲] 战斗滑铲结束后2秒内，移动速度提升{scale=10|10}%

Atormentador.card_desc: [Revancha] Obtienes un {scale=10|10}% de robo de vida contra tu objetivo de Revancha.

Bien engrasado.card_desc: [Arma] Tu velocidad de recarga aumenta un {scale=5|5}%.

Botas fracturadoras.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=50|50} PS.

Comienzo.card_desc: [Deslizamiento de combate] La distancia que recorre Deslizamiento de combate aumenta un {scale=10|10}%.

Condicionado.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=3|3}%.

Descubrimiento.card_desc: [Revancha] El daño de Revancha aumenta un 30% y reduce su recarga en 15s.

Fortaleza.card_desc: [Persecución] Te curas {scale=25|25} por cada disparo que acierte mientras usas Persecución.

Hero\u00edsmo.card_desc: [Deslizamiento de combate] Obtienes inmunidad al CM y un 90% de reducción de daño mientras usas Deslizamiento de combate.

Imponer.card_desc: [Persecución] Se reduce la recarga de Persecución en {scale=1|1}s.

Inevitable.card_desc: [Revancha] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=5|5}% cuando estás a 60 unidades de distancia del objetivo de Revancha.

Irrupci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Persecución] Recuperas {scale=2|2} de munición al activar Persecución.

Justicia cumplida.card_desc: [Revancha] Te curas un {scale=15|15}% de tu salud máxima tras asestar un golpe de gracia al objetivo de Revancha.

La muerte se acerca.card_desc: [Arma] Tus disparos de arma infligen 680 PS de daño cada 0,7s, pero se reduce tu cantidad de munición.

Los indignos no descansan.card_desc: [Deslizamiento de combate] Se reduce la recarga de Deslizamiento de combate {scale=5|5}% por cada enemigo que alcances con tus armas o habilidades.

Orden fuera.card_desc: [Deslizamiento de combate] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=10|10}% durante 2s después de que termine Deslizamiento de combate.

Re-equipar.card_desc: [Deslizamiento de combate] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición tras activar Deslizamiento de combate.

Reponer.card_desc: [Armas] Regeneras {scale=1|1} de munición tras conseguir un golpe de gracia o una eliminación.

Robustez.card_desc: [Persecución] Se reduce el daño recibido un {scale=5|5}% mientras usas Persecución.

Vista sagaz.card_desc: [Revancha] Aumenta la distancia a la cual Revancha revela a tu objetivo en {scale=10|10} unidades.

Apressando a Morte.card_desc: [Arma] Os disparos da sua arma causam 680 de dano a cada 0,7s, mas a munição é reduzida.

Atl\u00e9tico.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento em {scale=3|3}%.

Bem azeitado.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta em {scale=5|5}% a velocidade em que recarrega a arma.

Botas Leves.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

Coa\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Perseguição] Reduz o intervalo de Perseguição em {scale=1|1}s.

De Assalto.card_desc: [Perseguição] Gera {scale=2|2} de munição ao ativar Perseguição.

Descoberta.card_desc: [Retribuição] Aumenta em 30% o dano que você causa ao alvo da sua Retribuição e reduz em 15s o intervalo da Retribuição.

\u00c9 S\u00f3 o Come\u00e7o.card_desc: [Ofensiva] Aumenta {scale=10|10}% a distância percorrida pela Ofensiva.

Hero\u00edsmo.card_desc: [Ofensiva] Ganha imunidade a controle coletivo e reduz em 90% o dano recebido quando estiver usando a Ofensiva.

Inescap\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Retribuição] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento em {scale=5|5}% quando você estiver a 60 unidades do alvo da Retribuição.

Justi\u00e7a seja feita.card_desc: [Retribuição] Você se cura em {scale=15|15}% da sua vida áxima após dar o disparo fatal no alvo da sua Retribuição.

Mandado de Busca.card_desc: [Ofensiva] Aumenta a velocidade de movimento em {scale=10|10}% por 2s após a Ofensiva acabar.

O Perseguido.card_desc: [Retribuição] Você ganha {scale=10|10}% de roubo de vida contra o seu alvo da Retribuição.

Perseveran\u00e7a.card_desc: [Perseguição] Reduz em {scale=5|5}% o dano recebido enquanto está usando Perseguição.

Reequipado.card_desc: [Ofensiva]  Gera {scale=1|1} de munição ao ativar a Ofensiva.

Reposi\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Arma] Gera {scale=1|1}de munição após dar o golpe fatal ou conseguir uma eliminação.

Sem Tr\u00e9gua.card_desc: [Ofensiva]  Reduz o intervalo da Ofensiva em {scale=5|5}% para cada inimigo atingido pelas suas armas ou habilidades.

Tenacidade.card_desc: [Perseguição] Você se cura em {scale=25|25} para cada disparo que acertar usando Perseguição.

Vis\u00e3o Afiada.card_desc: [Retribuição] Aumenta em {scale=10|10} unidades a distância na qual o alvo da Retribuição é revelado.

\u0411\u044b\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Выстрелы из оружия наносят 680 ед. урона каждые 0,7 с., но ваш боезапас уменьшается.

\u0413\u0435\u0440\u043e\u0438\u0437\u04.card_desc: [Боевой подкат] Во время использования Боевого подката вы получаете на 90% меньше урона и иммунитет к эффектам контроля.

\u0413\u0440\u0435\u0448\u043d\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Боевой подкат] Каждое попадание по врагу вашим оружием или способностями сокращает перезарядку Боевого подката на {scale=5|5}%.

\u0416\u0435\u0440\u0442\u0432\u0430.card_desc: [Кара] Вы получаете {scale=10|10}% вампиризма против цели Кары.

\u041d\u0430\u0447\u0430\u043b\u043e.card_desc: [Боевой подкат] Дальность Боевого подката увеличивается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u041d\u0435\u0438\u0437\u0431\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Кара] Ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=5|5}%, пока цель Кары находится в радиусе 60 ед. от вас.

\u041e\u0440\u0434\u0435\u0440 \u043d\u0.card_desc: [Боевой подкат] После Боевого подката ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=10|10}% на 2 с.

\u041e\u0441\u0442\u0440\u043e\u0435 \u0.card_desc: [Кара] Радиус обнаружения цели Кары увеличивается на {scale=10|10} ед.

\u041e\u0442\u043a\u0440\u044b\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Кара] Вы наносите цели, отмеченной Карой, на 30% больше урона. Перезарядка Кары сокращается на 15 с.

\u041f\u0435\u0440\u0435\u043e\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Боевой подкат] Активация Боевого подката генерирует {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u041f\u043e\u043f\u043e\u043b\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Смертельные удары и устранения генерируют {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u041f\u0440\u0430\u0432\u043e\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Кара] Нанесение смертельного удара врагу, отмеченному Карой, исцеляет на {scale=15|15}% от максимального здоровья.

\u0421\u0430\u043f\u043e\u0433\u0438 \u0.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u0421\u0442\u043e\u0439\u043a\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Погоня] Пока действует Погоня, входящий урон снижается на {scale=5|5}%.

\u0425\u0440\u0430\u0431\u0440\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Погоня] Пока действует Погоня, каждое попадание по врагу исцеляет вас на {scale=25|25} ед.

Bystry wzrok.card_desc: [Zemsta] Zwiększa zasięg wykrywania celu Zemsty o {scale=10|10} jedn.

Grzeszni nie spoczn\u0105.card_desc: [Ślizg bojowy] Skraca czas odnowienia Ślizgu bojowego o {scale=5|5}% za każdego wroga trafionego bronią lub umiejętnością.

Hart.card_desc: [Pościg] Przywraca {scale=25|25} PZ za każdy strzał podczas trwania Pościgu.

Heroizm.card_desc: [Ślizg bojowy] Zapewnia odporność na Kontrolę tłumu i zmniejsza odnoszone przez ciebie obrażenia o 90% podczas trwania Ślizgu bojowego.

List go\u0144czy.card_desc: [Ślizg bojowy] Zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 2 s po zakończeniu Ślizgu bojowego.

Nieunikniony.card_desc: [Zemsta] Zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=5|5}%, jak długo znajdujesz się nie dalej niż 60 jedn. od celu Zemsty.

Odkrycie.card_desc: [Zemsta] Zadaje o 30% więcej obrażeń celowi Zemsty i skraca jej czas odnowienia o 15 s.

Pocz\u0105tek.card_desc: [Ślizg bojowy] Zwiększa zasięg Ślizgu bojowego o {scale=10|10}%.

Szybkie buty.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Twardo\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Pościg] Zmniejsza odnoszone przez ciebie obrażenia o {scale=5|5}% podczas trwania Pościgu.

W po\u015bcigu.card_desc: [Zemsta] Zapewnia ci {scale=10|10}% kradzieży życia przeciw celowi Zemsty.

Wymierzona kara.card_desc: [Zemsta] Zadanie Zabójczego ciosu celowi Zemsty przywraca ci {scale=15|15}% twojego maks. zdrowia.

Wymuszenie.card_desc: [Pościg] Skraca czas odnowienia Pościgu o {scale=1|1} s.

Zaopatrzenie.card_desc: [Ślizg bojowy] Aktywacja Ślizgu bojowego wytwarza {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji.

Zapasy.card_desc: [Broń] Wytwarza {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji po zadaniu Zabójczego ciosu lub udanej eliminacji.

Zbli\u017ca si\u0119 \u015bmier\u0107.card_desc: [Broń] Strzały twojej broni zadają 680 obrażeń co 0,7 s, ale pojemność magazynka zostaje zmniejszona.

Adalet Sa\u011fland\u0131.card_desc: [Cezalandırma] Cezalandırma hedefine Öldürücü Darbe vurduğunda maksimum Canının %{scale=15|15} kadarı iyileş.

Avlanan.card_desc: [Cezalandırma] Cezalandırma hedefine karşı %{scale=10|10} Can Çalma kazanırsın.

Ba\u015flang\u0131\u00e7 Hamlesi.card_desc: [İleri Kayma] İleri Kayma'nın gidiş mesafesini %{scale=10|10} artır.

Cesaret.card_desc: [Takipte] Takipte kullanırken her isabetli vuruş için {scale=25|25} Can iyileş.

G\u00f6z\u00fc Keskin.card_desc: [Cezalandırma] Cezalandırma hedefinin Açığa Çıkma menzilini {scale=10|10} birim artır.

H\u0131zl\u0131 \u00d6l\u00fcm.card_desc: [Silah] Silah atışların her 0,7 saniyede 680 hasar verir ancak Cephane sayın azalır.

Ka\u00e7\u0131n\u0131lmaz.card_desc: [Cezalandırma] Cezalandırma hedefinin 60 birim yakınında olduğunda %{scale=5|5} Hareket Hızı kazan.

Kahramanl\u0131k.card_desc: [İleri Kayma] İleri Kayma kullanırken Kitle Kontrol Dokunulmazlığı kazan ve aldığın hasarı %90 azalt.

Ke\u015fif.card_desc: [Cezalandırma] Cezalandırma hedefine %30 daha fazla hasar ver ve Cezalandırma'nın Bekleme Süresini 15sn azalt.

K\u00f6t\u00fcler Dinlenmez.card_desc: [İleri Kayma] Silahların veya yeteneklerin ile vurduğun her düşman için İleri Kayma'nın Bekleme Süresini %{scale=5|5} azalt.

Tutuklama Emri.card_desc: [İleri Kayma] İleri Kayma bittikten sonra Hareket Hızını 2sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} artır.

Yeniden Ku\u015fan.card_desc: [İleri Kayma] İleri Kayma'yı etkinleştirdikten sonra {scale=1|1} Cephane oluştur.

Yeniden Stokla.card_desc: [Silah] Bir Öldürücü Darbe veya Saf Dışı Bırakma yaptıktan sonra {scale=1|1} Cephane oluştur.
